description: This file defines the main route/component for a Tic Tac Toe game frontend built with Qwik. It manages game state, user interactions, AI moves, UI rendering, and accessibility features.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Main exported component function defining the game UI and logic

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on game cells, applying move, handling errors, and triggering CPU move if applicable

methods.name: handleModeChange
methods.description: Handles switching between game modes (PvP or CPU)

methods.name: handleResetBoard
methods.description: Resets the game board to initial state

methods.name: handleNewGame
methods.description: Starts a new game, resetting state
